**Ecological Community**: Freshwater, Marine

**Wikipedia summary**:  
The <b>coho salmon</b> (<i><b>Oncorhynchus kisutch</b>;</i> Karuk: achvuun) is a species of anadromous fish in the salmon family and one of the five Pacific salmon species. Coho salmon are also known as <b>silver salmon</b> or "silvers". The scientific species name is based on the Russian common name <i>kizhuch</i> (<U+043A><U+0438><U+0436><U+0443><U+0447>).
